reviews.review:
Almost a decade after release, still an amazing game!
Pls make more Valve!

I think this is the first true story driven game that I have played off of my own accord and i don't think i could have picked a better one to start with. The mechanics were fantastic, each puzzle completion gave you a great since of satisfaction, and the writing was just phenomenal. If you have and thought of weather to play this game or not it is definitely worth a play.

11/10 Game.

It's easy to understand the concept, the Phisics are amazing, the Graphics are really good. It has a good story line, It's probably the best game I have ever played in my entire life. 

(SPOILERS CONTAINTED IN THIS SECTION) And When your going up to the surface, 1. The turrent opera was amazing. 2. Seeing the worn down testing chambers when you go up gave me a wave of nastalgia even though I've only played the game for a day and a half.

All around a 11/10 game for Everything, thank you Valve for giving us such a good game series, I don't know what to say anymore now other than, I would love to see Portal 3...
Paranız varsa alın çok güzel oyun ama indirimleri beklemeniz daha doğru olur
this is a great game So far there has been nothing wrong i suggest this  to everyone
TROP BIEN (ou pas, à vous de le découvrir)

there's a lot of games i regret not making a review after finishing them, this game is one of these, i love portal, its so replay-able, fun, funny, and looks great.

i love it.

игра просто СУПЕР!!!

Juegazo :3 buenos puzles, buenos personajes y el final estuvo 10/10 Recomendado 1000%
Witziger zeitvertreibt und man muss seinen Kopf teilweise etwas anstrengen.
В игре всё мне нравится,можно играть в 2 и создавать карты.

This is one of the best games i have ever played, and new levels being made all the time by people, even my grand daughter has made a few levels. A lot of the fan made levels are far harder than the originals well worth playing if you like puzzle games.
La mejor sin duda toda la trama con GLADOS....
Great game to mess about in with friends. "Team building" more like Friendship Destruction.
Как никак лучшая игра от Valve в плане сюжета, концепции и русского дубляжа. Как по мне это лучшая головоломка. Хорошие саундтреки, геймплей, сюжет, дубляж в особенности.
very good game yes mmm yes very good yes yes
this made me n u t
thing go in, thing go out

정말 감사합니다. 이런 게임 만들어주셔서, 비록 정가주고 샀지만 전혀 아깝지 않은 돈이였다고 느껴지네요.
엔딩부분에서는 눈물이 나올 뻔 했습니다. 저도 모르게 몰입하고 있었나보네요 
전반적인 게임흐름 스토리 정말 아름답다는 말 밖에 안나옵니다.
벨브는 벨브인가봅니다.
i love this and so should you
Loved it...Played through the campaign and it was memorable.
Incredible follow up to an amazing game. This one really developed the story behind it all. Also the co-op levels are lot of fun to play with a friend.

I went into Portal expecting a great puzzle game, and I got it, but what really knocked my socks off is how incredible the story is. It made me laugh and it made me cry. It's one of those things that I wish I could experience for the first time again.

Portal 2 эта, та игра, которая продвинула игровую индустриию вперёд. Игре уже не мало лет, но она вполне конкурента способна и сейчас, отличный геймплей, шикарный сюжет и атмосфера, особенностью второй части стал кооператив, который реально разнообразил геймплей (Мне кажется каждый скидывал друга в кислоту). Portal 1 и 2 шедевры в которые должен поиграьь каждый.

super braincell inducing i actually stopped playing twice for a couple months and had to look up the solutions because i saved in the middle of solving it and couldnt remember what i had done previously. but yeah ummm good game would recommend also i think chell and glados are gay for each other and i do not accept constructive criticism <3
Нельзя тп в кровать Ким Кардяшьян, за то можно на луну
Great game, love the story, and I am currently doing the coop with my friend.
basicaly play the first game then this game in like 2 days and its like the best story line
It's one of the best games I played, go play it...NOW!
Me duele la cabeza, siento que voy a soñar con pintura blanca! AYUDAAA
The good news is that glados is safe with me in a potato attached to me portal gun. The bad news is that well I love eating potatoes...

Awesome game! There is infinite chambers because of the community workshop, so it is a great game to have and always have new stuff to play.

You can also create your own chambers, there's a lot of options and tools.

Playing with friends is insanely fun, you can both cooperate on solving the puzzles.

VERY GOOD GAME. Be ready to do puzzles though.
It is fun and has great puzzels
i got to chapter 6 then the game just kinda had a stroke. whenever i go back onto single player, i cant look up, down, left, or right

I was hesitant at first because puzzle games like this are usually over in a very short amount of time. However, let me tell you... It will work your brain for many many hours. I'm five hours in, I fell like I have already played for my 12$'s worth, and I'm not done yet... Really fun game and the puzzles are not repetitive. Five stars.
What a lovely little masterpiece this is.
Everyone needs to play this game!
I like this game.I would try the co-op, but have no friends with the game. Rip lmao
help my  master dong is currently at the other side of the chamber!

What a fun game, this game is one worth playing and worth buying. The winter and christmas sale especially goes for really cheap, it's such a good price for what the game contains. I really love how much content is in Portal 2. Recommend buying and playing portal 1 and portal 2, but start on portal 1 (it's super short compared to portal 2) and gives you a jist as well to what the story is before you play portal 2. Overally though, Portal 2 is great fun to play. Many puzzles although some try and be sneaky and sneak stuff in at last minute. But, it's a great fun to play. Recommend to play!
its a brilliant puzzle game with a well thought out story
Amazing sequel to the original Portal game, if you haven't played it yet... DO IT ALREADY IT'S GREAT!!!
